sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Exquizite, a language learning application. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and web services (collectively, the "App"). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the App.

subsections.title: Personal Information
subsections.intro: When you create an account with Exquizite, we collect:

items.text: Used for account creation, authentication, and communication
A unique identifier automatically generated for authentication and data association
Stored securely using industry-standard encryption (we never store passwords in plain text)
Word pairs, translations, set names, and learning preferences you create
Your chosen target and native languages for learning
Information about when you last practiced a set and your progress
Theme preferences, UI language, and other customization settings
Information about how you interact with the App, including game modes played and features used
Device type, operating system, and app version for troubleshooting and compatibility
Aggregated, non-personally identifiable usage statistics to improve the App

sections.title: Guest Mode
sections.intro: If you use the App without creating an account (Guest Mode):
items: No email address or personal information is collected
Your vocabulary sets are stored locally on your device only
Data is not synchronized across devices
Data may be lost if you uninstall the App or clear app data

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.intro: We use the information we collect to:

items.text: Enable account creation, data synchronization, and app functionality
Personalize your learning experience and remember your preferences
Use OpenAI's API to generate vocabulary suggestions and example sentences based on themes you provide
Authenticate users and protect against unauthorized access
Send important updates about the App (we do not send marketing emails without your consent)
Diagnose technical issues and improve app performance

subsections.title: Storage Location
subsections.intro: Your data is stored securely using Supabase, a cloud-based database service:

items.text: Data is hosted on secure servers managed by Supabase (powered by AWS infrastructure)
All data is encrypted in transit using HTTPS/TLS protocols
Row-Level Security (RLS) policies ensure you can only access your own data
Regular automated backups to prevent data loss

subsections.title: Security Measures
subsections.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures including:
items: Secure authentication using JWT tokens
Password hashing using bcrypt or similar algorithms
HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
Access logging and monitoring for suspicious activity
subsections.note: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

subsections.title: Supabase (Database and Authentication)
subsections.intro: We use Supabase to store and manage user data:

items.text: Cloud database, user authentication, and data synchronization
Email, user ID, vocabulary sets, practice history

subsections.title: OpenAI API (AI-Powered Features)
subsections.intro: We use OpenAI's API to generate vocabulary suggestions and example sentences:

items.text: AI-powered content generation for learning materials
ONLY the themes or topics you request (e.g., "food", "travel")
We do NOT send your personal information, email, user ID, or existing vocabulary sets to OpenAI
OpenAI processes requests transiently and does not use your data for model training (as per our API agreement)

subsections.title: Expo (Development Platform)
subsections.intro: We use Expo for app development and deployment:

items.text: App infrastructure and updates
Minimal crash reports and anonymous usage statistics

sections.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sections.intro: We do NOT sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties.
sections.intro2: We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

items.text: When you explicitly choose to share vocabulary sets with other users
With trusted third-party services (Supabase, OpenAI) as described above
If required by law, court order, or government regulation
In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets (you will be notified)
To protect the rights, property, or safety of Exquizite, our users, or others

sections.title: Shared Vocabulary Sets
sections.intro: When you choose to share a vocabulary set:
items: A unique share code is generated
Anyone with the share code can view and copy the set
Your email and personal information are NOT included in shared sets
You can view how many times your set has been viewed and copied
You can stop sharing a set at any time by deleting the share code

sections.title: Your Rights and Choices
sections.intro: You have the following rights regarding your data:

rights.title: Access Your Data
rights.description: You can view all your vocabulary sets and account information within the App

rights.title: Modify Your Data
rights.description: Edit or update your vocabulary sets, language preferences, and app settings at any time

rights.title: Delete Your Data
rights.description: You can request complete deletion of your account and all associated data:

steps.text: (coming soon): Navigate to Settings > Account > Delete Account
Contact us at viacheslav@exquizite.app with the subject "Data Deletion Request"
subItems: We will confirm your identity and delete all data within 30 days
Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone

rights.title: Export Your Data
rights.description: To request a copy of your data, contact us at viacheslav@exquizite.app with the subject "Data Export Request"

rights.title: Guest Mode
rights.description: If you used Guest Mode, you can delete your local data by:
items: Clearing the app's cache and data in your device settings
Uninstalling the App

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Exquizite is intended for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us at viacheslav@exquizite.app, and we will delete such information immediately.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: Your data may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside your country of residence, including the United States. By using the App, you consent to the transfer of your data to countries that may have different data protection laws than your country.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by:
items: Updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy
Displaying an in-app notification for material changes
Sending an email notification (if you have an account)
sections.note: Your continued use of the App after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.intro: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. If you delete your account:
items: Personal data is deleted within 30 days
Some data may be retained for legal or security purposes (e.g., to prevent fraud)
Shared vocabulary sets may remain accessible to users who previously copied them

sections.title: Your Consent
sections.content: By using Exquizite, you consent to this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.intro: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us:

contactInfo.responseTime: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 7 business days.

summary.title: Summary of Key Points
summary.intro: For your convenience, here's a quick summary:

items.label: What we collect

items.label: Why we collect it
items.value: To provide learning features, sync across devices, generate AI content

items.label: Third parties
items.value: Supabase (database), OpenAI (AI generation - no personal data sent)

items.label: Your rights
items.value: Access, modify, delete your data anytime

support.title: Exquizite Support
support.subtitle: Welcome to Exquizite Support! Find answers to common questions and get help with the app.
support.thankYou: Thank you for using Exquizite! Happy learning!

whatIs.title: What is Exquizite?
whatIs.content: Exquizite is a language learning app that helps you master vocabulary through interactive games and flashcards. Create custom word sets, practice with fun game modes, and track your progress.

needAccount.title: Do I need an account?
needAccount.intro: No! You can use Exquizite in two ways:

options.text: Use the app without signing up. Your sets are saved locally on your device only.
Sign up with email to sync your sets across all devices (iPhone, iPad, Android, Web).

howToStart.title: How do I get started?
steps: Download Exquizite from the App Store or Google Play
Choose "Continue as Guest" or "Sign Up"
Select your learning language (e.g., Spanish) and native language (e.g., English)
Create your first vocabulary set
Start practicing!

createAccount.title: How do I create an account?
steps: Tap "Sign Up" on the login screen
Enter your email address and create a password
Tap "Create Account"
You'll be logged in automatically

forgotPassword.title: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
steps: On the login screen, tap "Forgot Password?"
Enter your email address
Check your email for a password reset link
Follow the link to create a new password

guestToAccount.title: Can I switch from Guest Mode to an account?
guestToAccount.intro: Currently, Guest Mode data cannot be automatically transferred to an account. To preserve your sets:
steps: Share each set you want to keep (get the share code)
Create an account
Use the share codes to copy sets to your new account
guestToAccount.note: We're working on a direct migration feature!

logout.title: How do I log out?
steps: Go to Profile (bottom tab)
Scroll down and tap "Sign Out"

deleteAccount.title: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.content: See the Privacy & Data section below.

createNew.title: How do I create a new vocabulary set?
steps: Tap the "+" button on the home screen
Enter a name for your set (e.g., "Spanish Food")

Add word pairs:
  - Left column: Words in your learning language
  - Right column: Translations in your native language
Tap "Save" when done

wordLimit.title: How many words can I add to a set?
wordLimit.content: Each set can contain up to 20 word pairs. This limit ensures optimal learning and performance.

aiGeneration.title: Can I use AI to generate vocabulary?
aiGeneration.intro: Yes! Tap the "AI Suggestions" button when creating a set:
steps: Enter a theme (e.g., "restaurant vocabulary", "travel phrases")
Choose how many words you want (up to 20)
Review the AI-generated suggestions
Select the words you want to add
Edit or customize as needed

bulkImport.title: Can I import words in bulk?
bulkImport.intro: Yes! Tap "Bulk Import" when creating a set. Format options:

formats.name: Option 2: Hyphen-separated
formats.example:
word - translation
hola - hello
adiÃ³s - goodbye

formats.name: Option 3: Equals-separated
formats.example:
word = translation
hola = hello
adiÃ³s = goodbye

editSet.title: How do I edit a vocabulary set?
steps: Go to My Sets (bottom tab)
Tap the set you want to edit
Tap the edit icon (pencil) in the top right
Make your changes
Tap "Save"

deleteSet.title: How do I delete a vocabulary set?
steps: Go to My Sets
Tap the set you want to delete
Tap the menu icon (three dots)
Select "Delete Set"
Confirm deletion
deleteSet.warning: Note: This action cannot be undone!

differentLanguages.title: Can I use different languages for different sets?
differentLanguages.intro: Yes! By default, sets use your global language preferences, but you can override this per set:
steps: When creating/editing a set, tap "Language Override"
Select custom languages for this specific set
These settings only affect this one set

modes.text: Classic flip cards to test your memory
Multiple choice questions to reinforce learning
Find matching word pairs against the clock
Complete sentences with the correct words

howToPlay.title: How do I play a game mode?
steps: Go to My Sets or Home
Tap a vocabulary set
Choose a game mode from the menu
Follow the on-screen instructions
Complete the game to track your progress!

modeDetails.title: Flashcard Mode
items: Tap the card to flip between word and translation
Use "Previous" and "Next" buttons to navigate
Progress bar shows your position in the set
Practice is automatically tracked when you complete the set

modeDetails.title: Quiz Mode
items: Choose from 4 multiple-choice answers (A, B, C, D)
Tap an answer to check if it's correct
Green checkmark = Correct!
Red X = Try again or skip
Skip moves to the next question without scoring
See your final score at the end

modeDetails.title: Match Mode
items: Find matching word-translation pairs
Tap two cards to check if they match
Match all pairs as quickly as possible
Beat your best time!

modeDetails.title: Fill in the Blank Mode
items: Read the example sentence
Type the missing word
Use the hint if you need help
Submit your answer to check if it's correct

replay.title: Can I replay a game mode?
replay.content: Yes! You can practice any set as many times as you want. Your "Last Practiced" date updates each time you complete a session.

howToShare.title: How do I share a vocabulary set?
steps: Open the set you want to share
Tap the share icon (or menu > Share)
A unique share code is generated (e.g., ABC123XYZ)
Share the code via message, email, or social media

useShared.title: How do I use a shared set?
steps: Tap the home screen search or "Enter Share Code" option
Enter the share code (e.g., ABC123XYZ)
Preview the set
Tap "Copy to My Sets"
Optionally rename the set
The set is now in your library!

viewStats.title: Can I see who viewed or copied my shared set?
viewStats.intro: Yes! When viewing a shared set, you can see:

items.text: How many times it's been viewed
How many users copied it

viewStats.note: You cannot see individual users' names or emails (privacy protection).

stopSharing.title: Can I stop sharing a set?
steps: Open the shared set
Tap the menu icon
Select "Stop Sharing" or "Delete Share Code"
The share code will no longer work
stopSharing.note: Existing copies in other users' libraries remain (they own their copies).

autoUpdate.title: Do shared sets update automatically?
autoUpdate.content: No. When someone copies your shared set, they get a snapshot at that moment. If you edit your original set later, their copy does not update automatically.

appLanguage.title: How do I change the app language (UI)?
appLanguage.intro: Exquizite supports 45+ languages for the interface:
steps: Go to Settings
Tap "App Language"
Select your preferred language
The app will reload with the new language
appLanguage.note: Supported Languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Hebrew, and 35+ more!

learningLanguages.title: How do I change my learning languages?
steps: Go to Profile
Tap "Language Preferences"
Select your Learning Language (language you're studying)
Select your Native Language (language you know)
Save changes
learningLanguages.note: Note: This affects new sets. Existing sets keep their original languages unless you edit them individually.

darkMode.title: How do I enable Dark Mode?
steps: Go to Settings
Toggle "Dark Mode" on/off
darkMode.note: Dark mode is easier on the eyes in low-light conditions and can save battery on OLED screens.

tour.title: What is the First-Time Tour?
tour.intro: When you first use Exquizite, an interactive tour guides you through key features. To restart the tour:
steps: Go to Settings
Tap "Restart Tour"
Follow the on-screen prompts

syncIssue.title: My sets aren't syncing across devices

accountSteps.label: For Account Users:
steps: Make sure you're logged into the same account on all devices
Check your internet connection
Try logging out and back in
Pull down to refresh on the My Sets screen

syncIssue.guestNote: For Guest Users: Guest Mode data is stored locally only and does NOT sync. Create an account to enable sync.

crashing.title: The app is crashing or freezing
steps: Force close the app and reopen it
Restart your device
Check for updates in the App Store/Play Store
Clear app cache (Settings > Apps > Exquizite > Clear Cache on Android)
Reinstall the app (Note: Guest Mode data will be lost!)
crashing.note: If the issue persists, contact us at viacheslav@exquizite.app with device model, OS version, app version, and description of the issue.

aiNotWorking.title: AI suggestions aren't working
steps: Check your internet connection
Try again in a few minutes (temporary server issue)
Use a different theme/topic
Add words manually as a fallback

sharedSetNotFound.title: I can't find a shared set with the code

items.text: Some share codes have expiration dates
The creator stopped sharing the set
Double-check the code for accuracy (codes are case-sensitive)
Ensure you're online

wrongLanguage.title: The app is in the wrong language
steps: Go to Settings (look for the gear icon)
Find the language option (even if text is unreadable, it's usually near the top)
Select your language
The app will reload

lostSets.title: I lost my vocabulary sets (Guest Mode)
lostSets.content: Unfortunately, Guest Mode data is stored locally only. If you uninstalled the app, cleared app data, or reset your device, the data cannot be recovered.
lostSets.recommendation: We strongly recommend creating an account to enable cloud backup and sync.

keyboardIssue.title: The keyboard covers the input field
keyboardIssue.intro: This is a known issue on some devices. Try:
steps: Tapping outside the input field and re-focusing
Rotating your device to landscape mode
Scrolling the screen manually
Using an external keyboard (tablets/desktops)
keyboardIssue.note: We're working on a fix in the next update!

isSecure.title: Is my data secure?
items: All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text
Cloud data is stored on secure Supabase servers (AWS-powered)
Row-Level Security ensures you can only access your own data

whatCollected.title: What data do you collect?

collected.text: Email, user ID, vocabulary sets, practice history, language preferences
Vocabulary sets stored locally only (no cloud data)
Anonymous usage statistics to improve the app

notCollected: Photos or media (unless you choose to share)

thirdPartySharing.title: Do you share my data with third parties?
thirdPartySharing.intro: No, we do NOT sell or rent your data. We use trusted services:

services.text: AI vocabulary generation (only theme names are sent, NOT your personal data)

downloadData.title: How do I download my data?
downloadData.intro: To request a copy of your data:
steps: Email viacheslav@exquizite.app with subject "Data Export Request"
Include your registered email address
We'll send you a file with all your vocabulary sets and account info within 7 business days

deleteAccountData.title: How do I delete my account and data?
deleteAccountData.label: Permanent Deletion:
steps: Email viacheslav@exquizite.app with subject "Data Deletion Request"
Include your registered email address
We'll confirm your identity and delete all data within 30 days
importantNotes: Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
Shared sets copied by other users remain in their libraries (they own their copies)
Some data may be retained for legal/security purposes (e.g., fraud prevention)
deleteAccountData.comingSoon: Coming Soon: In-app account deletion (Settings > Account > Delete Account)

categories.title: Bug Reports & Feature Requests
categories.subject: "Bug Report" or "Feature Request"
includeItems: Device model and OS version (e.g., iPhone 14, iOS 17.2)

items.a: Yes! Exquizite is completely free to use with no ads or in-app purchases. All features are available to all users.

items.q: What platforms is Exquizite available on?
items.a: iOS: iPhone and iPad (iOS 13+), Android: Phones and tablets (Android 6.0+), Web: app.exquizite.com (coming soon)

items.q: Can I learn multiple languages at once?
items.a: Yes! You can create sets for different language pairs. Your global language preference is just a default; each set can have its own languages.

Guest Mode: Yes, fully offline after initial download. With Account: Requires internet for initial sync, then limited offline access (cached data only). We're working on full offline mode with sync for account users!
Yes! Our core mission is to make language learning accessible to everyone. We may introduce optional premium features in the future, but the core app will always remain free.

tips.title: Create Focused Sets
tips.content: Instead of one giant "Spanish" set, create themed sets like "Spanish Food", "Travel Phrases", etc.

tips.title: Practice Regularly
tips.content: Consistent practice beats cramming. Review each set at least once per week.

tips.title: Use Multiple Game Modes
tips.content: Each mode reinforces learning differently - mix them up for best results!
